Dan Wieden, the architect, creative guru and gifted manager who built what is arguably the most famous ad agency in the world, died Friday, Sept. 30, 2022, at age 77.

articles.title: Dollar vs. pound: How Brexit is at the heart of the UK currency rout - Markets Insider
articles.description: While the UK government's tax-cutting plan spooked markets, strategists pointed to the UK's withdrawal from the EU as at the heart of the fall.
articles.content:
The British pound's crash last week is seen as a story of US dollar strength but dig deeper, and the long-lasting impact of Brexit emerges.
